availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, carpenter. Kentucky native. Married to Catherine Burris Valentine. Father of Annie E. Valentine, Richard B. Valentine, and Samuel Valentine. Carpenter in Fayette County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident in Henry County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, District 1, p. 160A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, New Castle, p. 242.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, New Castle, p. 328B.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 6507.
"John Valentine (1821-1904)," Find A Grave, Memorial #36040521, accessed January 23, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/36040521.
